message.content:
cs.NI, cs.IT, cs.CR, cs.SY, cs.MM

Reasoning: 
1. cs.NI (Networking and Internet Architecture) - The paper proposes a novel framework for V2V failure recovery using D2D communications, which falls under the networking and internet architecture domain. 
2. cs.IT (Information Theory) - The paper discusses LTE-based D2D mechanisms, which involves information transmission and processing, and hence can be categorized under information theory. 
3. cs.CR (Cryptography and Security) - The paper may also fall under the cryptography and security domain as it deals with secure communication between vehicles. 
4. cs.SY (Systems and Control) - The paper proposes a new paradigm of hybrid V2V-D2D communications, which involves control and management of vehicular communication systems. 
5. cs.MM (Multimedia) - The paper presents simulation results of message delivery, which may involve multimedia data transmission and processing.
